name: RolliCool
0:
”Alexa, turn on plug”
”Alexa, turn off plug”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Set the perfect temperature effortlessly by using Alexa to talk to your RolliCool! Turn your RolliCool on or off, and adjust the temperature just by using your voice. Make your home the most comfortable it’s ever been with RolliCool!
